item.title: Boeing defence workers go on strike in new blow to aviation giant
item.description: About 3,200 workers who build F-15 fighter jets and other military aircraft voted to reject the firm's latest contract deal.

item.title: Dozens of migrants die in boat capsize off Yemen
item.description: Dozens are missing after a boat carrying more than 150 migrants, many believed to be Ethiopian, sank in bad weather.

item.title: Watch: Twin waterspouts merge near Italian coastline
item.description: A local tour boat operator paused an excursion so he could film the waterspouts off Italy's east coast.

item.title: F1 tycoon pleads guilty in rare Singapore corruption case
item.description: Ong had given expensive gifts to a former minister, including an all-expenses paid trip to Qatar.

item.title: Mission begins to save snails threatened by own beauty
item.description: Researchers in Cuba and the UK are working together to reveal the biological secrets of the beautiful but endangered Polymita snail.
